Activity: Check emails and respond to any queries from the Quality Assurance team.
Conduct a preliminary review session with @qatest-1 and @qatest-2 to validate the table design and data mappings. Address any identified issues.
Make necessary adjustments to the table design based on QA feedback. Ensure all data mappings are accurate and complete.
Finalize the table design and data mappings. Prepare a comprehensive documentation package for the EHR Integration Developers.
Email @ehrdev-1 and @ehrdev-2 to share the finalized design and request their input on implementation timelines.
Review any final feedback from the EHR Integration Developers and update the documentation as needed.
Complete all documentation and prepare for a final review with the IT Project Manager.
